ModMetaData.name: Diamond Industry Harmacy
ModMetaData.author: Mario55770
ModMetaData.description:
Brought to you by the exclusive Diamond Industries, the harmacy. Featuring better drug production, poisons, medicines, and more, including antidotes. For legal reasons, Diamond Industry executives require warnings informing users to not load poisons into the slot labeled poison, as that would create a chemical weapon.
Discord https://discord.gg/FqVaCUdPeK
Github https://github.com/Mario55770/DShield-Trap-Framework
